revision.comment: Central Nahuatl: correct whitespace of section 0
revision.text: ==Central Nahuatl== ===Alternative forms=== * {{sense|Tlaxcala}} {{l|nhn|xonakatl}} ===Noun=== {{head|nhn|noun}} # [[onion]]. [[Category:Amecameca Central Nahuatl]] [[Category:Cholula Central Nahuatl]] {{c|nhn|Vegetables}} ---- ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|/ʃonakatɬ/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nci|nouns}} # [[onion]] #* '''1555''', [[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]], ''[[w:Aqui comienca un vocabulario en la lengua castellana y mexicana|Aqui comienca un vocabulario en la lengua castellana y mexicana]]'', f. 61r. #*: Cebolla. '''xonacatl'''. [[Category:nci:Vegetables]] ---- ==Eastern Huasteca Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== Cognate to {{cog|nci|xonacatl}} ===Noun=== {{head|nhe|noun}} # [[onion]]. ---- ==Tetelcingo Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== Cf. {{cog|nci|xonacatl}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nhg|[ʃoˈnakat͜ɬ]}} ===Noun=== {{head|nhg|noun|plural|xonacame}} # {{l|en|onion}} ===References=== * {{R:Brewer & Brewer 1971|pages=22, 247}}
